description: Contains various information relating to a single contact of an adjudication record. Adjudication records are used by Ambulatory Pharmacy during prescription copay adjudication.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adjudication record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The contact number for this adjudication

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: The unique contact number for this adjudication

columns.name: NAME_HX
columns.description: Stores the history of the record name

columns.name: CONTACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The contact type category ID for the adjudication record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Primary


Secondary


Tertiary


Quaternary


Quinary


Senary


Septenary


Octonary


Nonary

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category ID of the adjudication message.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Attempted


Pending


Success


Failure


Cash


Charge Recalculation Needed


In Progress

columns.name: VERSION_NUM_C_NAME
columns.description:
Version number category ID of the NCPDP message


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


5.1


D.0


United Arab Emirates

columns.name: TX_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transaction code category ID of the adjudication message (Billing, Rebill, Reversal...)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Bill (B1)


Reversal (B2)


Rebill (B3)


Eligibility (E1)


Authorization


Cancellation


Claim


Information Reporting (N1)

columns.name: RESPONSE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The response status category ID if the message was accepted or rejected.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Accepted


Rejected

columns.name: SERVICE_PROV_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The provider ID type category ID (NPI, DEA, State License...) that was sent over RX adjudication


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


National Provider Identifier (NPI)


Blue Cross


Blue Shield


Medicare


Medicaid


UPIN


NCPDP Provider ID


State License


Champus


Health Industry Number (HIN)


Federal Tax ID


Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA)


State Issued


Plan Specific


Other

columns.name: SERVICE_PROV
columns.description: The unique ID of the pharmacy (service provider).

columns.name: SERVICE_DATE
columns.description: The service date of the order. This is typically the date the pharmacy starts processing the order.

columns.name: MESSAGE
columns.description: Free text message sent back from the payor.

columns.name: GROUP_ID
columns.description: The Group ID number submitted in the adjudication attempt

columns.name: PLAN_ID
columns.description: Assigned by the Pharmacy Benefits Manager to identify a set of parameters, benefits, or coverage criteria used to adjudicate a claim.

columns.name: NETWORK_REIMBURSE
columns.description: As defined by the Pharmacy Benefits Bander, this field identifies the network, for the covered member, used to calculate the reimbursement to the pharmacy.

columns.name: PAYOR_QUALIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the type of payor ID.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


National Payor ID


Health Industry Number


Bank Information Number (BIN)


National Association of Insurance Commissioners


Other

columns.name: PAYOR_ID
columns.description: The ID of the payer from the Payer ID field of the adjudication response.

columns.name: TX_RESP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category ID of the  adjudication transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Approved


Captured


Duplicate of Paid


PA Deferred


Paid


Duplicate of Capture


Rejected


Duplicate of Approved

columns.name: AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Number assigned by the PBM to identify an authorized transaction.

columns.name: ADDL_MESSAGE
columns.description: This is a free text message sent from the PBM.

columns.name: HELPDESK_PH_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code qualifying the phone number in the 'Help Desk Phone Number' (550-8F) Field 550-8F)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Switch


Intermediary


Processor/PBM


Other

columns.name: HELP_DESK_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: Ten-digit phone number of the help desk.

columns.name: PRESC_REF_NUM_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reference number (prescription or service) category ID assigned by the provider for the order.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Rx Billing


Service Billing

columns.name: PRESC_REFRENCE_NUM
columns.description: Reference number assigned by the provider for the dispensed drug/product and/or service provided.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_AMOUNT
columns.description: Amount that is calculated by the PBM and returned to the pharmacy as the TOTAL amount to be paid by the patient to the pharmacy: The patient's total cost share, including copayments, amounts applied to deductible, over maximum amounts, penalties, etc.

columns.name: INGREDIENT_COSTPAID
columns.description: The amount paid for the drug ingredient. Amount included in 'Total Amount Paid'

columns.name: DISPENSE_FEE_PAID
columns.description: Dispensing fee paid included in the "Total Amount Paid" sent out in adjudication (NCPDP Field 509-F9)

columns.name: TAX_EXEMPT_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the payor as exempt from taxes.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Tax Exempt


Not Tax Exempt

columns.name: FLAT_SALES_TAX_PAID
columns.description: Amount of flat sales tax paid. Included in the "Total Amount Paid".

columns.name: PERC_SALES_TAX_PAID
columns.description: Amount of percentage sales tax paid which is included in the Total Amount Paid

columns.name: PERC_SALES_TAX_RATE
columns.description: Percentage sales tax rate used to calculate Percentage Sales Tax Amount Paid

columns.name: PERC_SALES_TX_BAS_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the percentage sales tax paid basis.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Gross Amount Due


Ingredient Cost


Ingredient Cost + Dispensing Fee

columns.name: INCENTIVE_AMT_PAID
columns.description: Amount represents the contractually agreed upon incentive fee paid for specific services rendered. Amount is included in the 'Total Amount Paid'

columns.name: PROF_SERVICE_FEE
columns.description: Amount representing the contractually agreed upon fee for professional services rendered. This amount is included in the Total Amount Paid

columns.name: OTHER_PAYOR_AMT_REC
columns.description: Total dollar amount of any payment from another source including coupons.

columns.name: TOTAL_AMOUNT_PAID
columns.description: Total amount to be paid by the claim's pharmacy benefit manager (PBM).

columns.name: BASIS_ING_REIMB_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code identifying how the reimbursement amount was calculated for Ingredient Cost Paid


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Ingredient Cost Paid as Submitted


Ingredient Cost Reduced to AWP Pricing


Ingredient Cost Reduced to AWP Less X% Pricing


Usual & Customary Paid as Submitted


Paid Lower of Ingredient Cost Plus Fess Versus Usual & Customary


MAC Pricing Ingredient Cost Paid


MAC Pricing Ingredient Cost Reduced to MAC


Contract Pricing


Acquisition Pricing

columns.name: AMT_ATTRB_SALES_TAX
columns.description: Amount to be collected from the patient that is included in Patient Pay Amount that is due to sales tax paid.

columns.name: ACCUMULATED_DED_AMT
columns.description: Amount in dollars met by the patient/family in a deductible plan.

columns.name: REMAINING_DED_AMT
columns.description: Amount not met by the patient/family in the deductible plan.

columns.name: REMAINING_BEN_AMT
columns.description: Amount remaining in a patient/family plan with a periodic maximum benefit.

columns.name: AMT_APPLIED_DEDUCT
columns.description: Amount to be collected from a patient that is included in Patient Pay Amount that is applied to a periodic deductible.

columns.name: AMT_COPAY
columns.description: Amount to be collected from the patient that is included in Patient Pay Amount that is due to a per prescription copay/coinsurance.

columns.name: AMT_ATTRIB_PROD_SEL
columns.description: Amount to be collected from the patient that is included in the Patient Pay Amount that is due to the patient's selection of drug product.

columns.name: AMT_EXCEED_BEN_MAX
columns.description: Amount to be collected from the patient that is included in Patient Pay Amount that is due to the patient exceeding a periodic benefit maximum

columns.name: BASIS_CALC_DISP_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating how the reimbursement amount was calculated for Dispensing Fee Paid


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Quantity Dispensed


Quantity Intended To Be Dispensed


Usual & Customary/Prorated


Waived Due To Partial Fill


Other

columns.name: BASIS_CALC_COPAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating how the reimbursement amount was calculated for Patient Pay Amount


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: BASIS_CALC_DISP_C_NAME

columns.name: BASIS_CALC_FLATTX_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating how the reimbursement amount was calculated for Flat Sales Tax Amount Paid


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Quantity Dispensed


Quantity Intended To Be Dispensed

columns.name: BASIS_PCT_SLS_TAX_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating how the reimbursement amount was calculated for Percentage Sales Tax Amount Paid


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: BASIS_CALC_FLATTX_C_NAME

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_PROC_DT
columns.description: Date the prior authorization request was processed.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_EFF_DT
columns.description: Date the prior authorization became effective.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_EXP_DT
columns.description: Date the prior authorization expires.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_QUANTITY
columns.description: Amount authorized by the prior authorization expressed in metric decimal units.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_DOL_AUTH
columns.description: Amount authorized in the prior authorization.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_NM_REFIL
columns.description: Number of refills authorized by the prior authorization.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_ACCUM
columns.description: Accumulated authorized amount expressed in metric decimal units.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Unique number identifying the prior authorization assigned by the PBM.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_TM
columns.description: Stores the date and time of entry when a record is edited

columns.name: CONTINUE_ON_FAIL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the adjudication attempt will continue to the next coverage if this fails.  'N' or NULL indicate that the attempt will not continue on failure.  'Y' indicates that the attempt will continue on failure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_NUM_SENT
columns.description: The number being sent in for prior authorization for prescription adjudication.

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The prior authorization category ID being sent during prescription adjudication.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Prior Authorization


Medical Certification


Early Periodic Screening Diagnosis Treatment


Exemption from Copay


Exemption from RX


Family Plan. Indic. 


Temporary Assistance for Needy Families 


Payor Defined Exemption

columns.name: SUBMISSION_CLR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Additional information category ID of an adjudication message to tell the payor more information about the order for adjudication. Like the patient is a student or is going on vacation.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified, Default


No Override


Other Override


Vacation Supply


Lost Prescription


Therapy Change


Starter Dose


Medically Necessary


Process Compound For Approved Ingredients


Meet Plan Limitations


Other

columns.name: DISPENSE_FEE_SUBMTD
columns.description: Dispensing fee submitted by the pharmacy to the payer. (412-DC)

columns.name: PROF_SVC_FEE_SUBMTD
columns.description: Amount submitted by the provider for professional services rendered. (440-E5)

columns.name: INCENTIV_AMT_SUBMTD
columns.description: Amount represents a fee that is submitted by the pharmacy for contractually agreed upon services. (439-E3)

columns.name: QTY_PRESCRIBED
columns.description: Prescribed amount expressed in metric decimal units. (460-ET)

columns.name: UNIT_DOSE_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the type of unit dose dispensing. (429-DT)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Not Unit Dose


Manufacturer Unit Dose


Pharmacy Unit Dose

columns.name: ORG_PRES_PROD_QF_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code qualifying the value in 'Originally Prescribed Product/Service' Code. (453-EJ)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Universal Product Code (UPC)


Health Related Item (HRI)


National Drug Code (NDC)


Universal Product Number (UPN)


Department of Defense (DOD)


Drug Use Review/ Professional Pharmacy Service (DUR/PPS)


Common Procedure Terminology (CPT4)


Common Procedure Terminology (CPT5)


Health Care Financing Administration Common Procedural Coding System (HCPCS)


Pharmacy Practice Activity Classification (PPAC)


National Pharmaceutical Product Interface Code (NAPPI)


International Article Numbering System (EAN)


Drug Identification Number (DIN)

columns.name: LEVEL_OF_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the type of service the provider rendered. (418-DI)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Patient Consulation


Home Delivery


Emergency


24 hour service


Patient Consulation Regarding Generic Product Selection


In-Home Service

columns.name: INTRMED_AUTH_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating that authorization occurred for intermediary processing. (463-EW)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Specified


Intermediary Authorization


Other Override

columns.name: INTRAUTH_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Value indicating intermediary authorization occurred. (464-EX)

columns.name: COUPON_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the type of coupon being used. (485-KE)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Price Discount


Free Product


Other

columns.name: COUPON_VALUE_AMT
columns.description: Value of the coupon. (487-NE)

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_REQTYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code identifying type of prior authorization request. (498-PA)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Initial


Reauthorization


Deferred

columns.name: PRIORAUTH_RQBEG_DT
columns.description: Beginning date for a prior authorization request. (498-PB)

columns.name: PRIORAUTH_RQEND_DT
columns.description: Ending date for a prior authorization request. (498-PC)

columns.name: PRIORAUTH_BAS_RQ_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code describing the reason for prior authorization request. (498-PD)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Medical Exception


Plan Requirement


Increase Plan Limitation

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_REP_FNAM
columns.description: First name of the patient's authorized representative (498-PE)

columns.name: PRIOR_AUTH_REP_LNAM
columns.description: Last name of the patient's authorized representative. (498-PF)

columns.name: PRIOR_ATH_REP_STADD
columns.description: Street address of the patient's representative. (498-PG)

columns.name: PRI_ATH_REP_CITYADD
columns.description: City of the patient's representative. (498-PH)

columns.name: PRI_ATH_REP_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
State or province category ID of the patient's representative. (498-PJ)


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: PRI_ATH_REP_ZIP
columns.description: ZIP code or other postal zone code of the patient's representative. (498-PK)

columns.name: PRI_ATH_NUM_ASSGN
columns.description: Unique number identifying the prior authorization assigned by the processor. (498-PY)

columns.name: PRI_ATH_AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Number assigned by the processor to identify an authorized transaction. (503-F3)

columns.name: PRI_ATH_SUPP_DOC
columns.description: Free-text comments supplied by the pharmacy that may be used to process a  prior authorization transaction. (498-PP)

columns.name: SMOKER_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the patient as a smoker or non-smoker. (334-1C)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Non-Smoker


Smoker

columns.name: PREGNANCY_IND_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code indicating the patient as pregnant or not pregnant. (335-2C)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Pregnant


Pregnant

columns.name: PRESCRIBER_LOC_CODE
columns.description: Location address code assigned to the prescriber as identified in the National Provider System (NPS). (467-1E)

columns.name: ALT_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: Person identifier to be used for controlled product reporting. Identifier may be that of the patient or the person picking up the prescription as required by the governing body. (330-CW)

columns.name: COUPON_NUM
columns.description: Unique serial number assigned to the prescription coupons. (486-ME)

columns.name: PAT_ID_QF_C_NAME
columns.description:
NCPDP code qualifying the Patient ID sent in 332-CY. (331-CX)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Social Security Number


Driver's License Number


US Military ID


Other

columns.name: PAT_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: ID assigned to the patient. (332-CY)

columns.name: EMPLOYER
columns.description: A unique ID assigned to the employer. (333-CZ)

columns.name: PAT_PAID_AMT_SUBMTD
columns.description: Amount the pharmacy received from the patient for the prescription dispensed.

columns.name: PAT_DOB_DT
columns.description: Date of birth of patient.
